page.title: 17Our School
page.content: Our{school opened}on 26th May 1873. The{first head}was Mr. Henry Keir and there were 164 children. Today our head is Mr. Fenwick and we have 190 children aged from 4 to 9 years. The {building}used to be two separate schools but now it is one. We have 6 classrooms, and 1 hall. Our kitchen is too small to cook food, so we have our meals delivered in a van from Astley High School. Our{schoolday}is in 3 parts: 9.00 am to 10.30 am, 10.45 am to 12 noon and 1.15 pm to 3.15 pm. We have a morning break and a lunch break. We have to finish at exactly 3.15 because many children have to get a special bus home. This means that the lunch break is very busy because all our{clubs}happen then. The most popular are Recorders and Science Club. We have a choir which does a show in the Summer term.
